trigger: Broken, cracked, or missing window glass
action_item: Repair or replace glass before proceeding with air sealing or insulation. Document completion.
documentation: Photo of broken and repaired window, repair invoice or work note.
policy_text: Broken windows compromise safety, security, and energy efficiency; must be repaired before further WX.

trigger: Exterior door frame unsealed, rotted, or deteriorated
action_item: Repair or replace exterior door frame. Ensure weather-tight seal before air sealing or insulation.
documentation: Photo of damaged and repaired frame, sealant or repair material note.
policy_text: Exterior door framing must be sound and sealed to prevent air, moisture, and pest intrusion.

trigger: Window or door missing required egress (bedroom or habitable space)
action_item: Notify client/owner; refer to code official if non-compliance affects life safety. Weatherization measures may be deferred.
documentation: Photo of window/door, code reference, communication with client/owner.
policy_text: Egress requirements are critical for fire and life safety. Program may not proceed with non-compliant openings.

trigger: Missing or nonfunctional door locks on exterior doors
action_item: Install or repair locks to secure home before or during weatherization. Document completion.
documentation: Photo of locks, job file note.
policy_text: Exterior doors must be lockable to ensure security during and after project.
